title: Traits and Features
content: Ranger Lvl 1 Barbarian Lvl 1 Paladin Lvl 1 College of Valour Lvl 3 Tempest Domain (Cleric Lvl 1 Subclass) War Domain (Cleric Lvl 1 Subclass) Dexterity Saving Throw Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to Dexterity saving throws. Bard Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Intelligence Saving Throw Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to Intelligence saving throws. Rogue Lvl 1 Wizard Lvl 1 Hand Crossbow Proficiency Feature Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Hand Crossbow
